step-type.name: Request Certificate Wait
step-type.description: Request a certificate from TPP and poll for to get the status for issuance

property-ui.label: TPP API URL
property-ui.description: The URL for the Venafi TPP server in the format https://server-name

property-ui.label: TPP policy DN
property-ui.description: The path for certificate within TPP

property-ui.label: CA DN
property-ui.description: The DN for the CA within TPP

property-ui.label: Certificate name
property-ui.description: The name for the certificate

property-ui.label: Format
property-ui.description: Format for the certificate

property-ui.label: Include chain
property-ui.description: Include the certificate chain. Not applicable to DER.

property-ui.label: Include private key
property-ui.description: Include the private key. Only applies to PKCS #12 or JKS.

property-ui.label: Friendly name
property-ui.description: A frieldly name to associate with the certificate.

property-ui.label: Key store PW
property-ui.description: Password to protect the JKS keystore.

property-ui.label: Private key PW
property-ui.description: The password to protect the private key. Only applies to PKCS #12 or JKS format when the private key has been requested.

property-ui.label: Subject alt names
property-ui.description: Subject alternative names in the format : Type 1 : Value 1; Type 2 : Value 2; See documentation for information on types.

property-ui.label: Filename
property-ui.description: The name of the file to hold the certificate. Extension will be added and the filename will be provided as an output property.

property-ui.label: Poll timout
property-ui.description: The time to wait for the certificate to be approved and ready within TPP

property-ui.label: Poll interval
property-ui.description: The interval between checking the certificate status within TPP

property-ui.label: tpp Username
property-ui.description: The username for the tpp connection

property-ui.label: tpp User password
property-ui.description: The password for the tpp user

property-ui.description: JSON object containing the policy details taken from the 'policy' output property of the step called 'Get Venafi Policy'

property-ui.label: Email
property-ui.description: The email address to associated with the certificate

property-ui.label: Web URL
property-ui.description: The website URL to assiciate with the certificate

property-ui.label: Private key file
property-ui.description: The filename to hold the private key

property-ui.label: Public key file
property-ui.description: The filename to hold the public key

step-type.name: Retrieve Certificate
step-type.description: Retrieve a certificate from TPP. Certificate already exists.

property-ui.description: Format for the certificate

property-ui.label: Include chain
property-ui.description: Include the certificate chain. Not applicable to DER.

property-ui.label: Include private key
property-ui.description: Include the private key. Only applies to PKCS #12 or JKS.

property-ui.label: Friendly name
property-ui.description: A name to associate with the certicate. Optional for Base64 certificates and MANDATORY for JKS.

property-ui.label: Keystore password
property-ui.description: Password for the JKS keystore. MANDATORY whe JKS format is selected.

property-ui.label: Private key PW
property-ui.description: The password to protect the private key. Only applies to PKCS #12 or JKS format when the private key has been requested.

property-ui.description: The name of the file to hold the certificate. Extension will be added and the filename will be provided as an output property.

property-ui.description: The time to wait for the certificate to be approved and ready within TPP
